qas.question: What years did the Zhengtong Emperor reign?
Who maintains an edict of the Zhengtong Emperor?

answers.text: The Information Office of the State Council of the PRC

qas.question: Who was the edict addressed to?
Who had a message delivered to them by Zhengtong?

answers.text: after the latter's agent had brought holy relics to the Ming court

context: <a1_0>The Information Office of the State Council of the PRC<a1_0/> preserves an edict of the Zhengtong Emperor (r. <a0_0>1435–1449<a0_0/>) addressed to <a2_0>the Karmapa<a2_0/> in 1445, written <a4_0>after the latter's agent had brought holy relics to the Ming court<a4_0/>. Zhengtong had the following message delivered to the <a3_0>Great Treasure Prince of Dharma<a3_0/>, the Karmapa:
